about.title: About Me
about.description: My name is Lucas, I'm 23 years old, born in São Paulo and currently living in São Bernardo do Campo. I started my journey in technology in 2022, studying Systems Analysis and Development. Since then, I have been working as a front-end developer, with a passion for creating intuitive, functional, and enjoyable experiences, always seeking learning and growth.

projectsList.title: Note Me - To Do List
projectsList.description: A simple and functional to-do list project, built with React, JavaScript and styled with TailwindCSS. Ideal for practicing React hooks, local storage and URL manipulation with react-router-dom.

projectsList.title: Foco +
projectsList.description: A study dashboard developed with Angular and styled using TailwindCSS. The project aims to help organize study routines while providing daily challenges to improve focus and productivity.

footer.text: @ {{year}} All Rights Reserved | Lucas Patrício | Front-end Developer
